channel.title: MTA on host os
channel.description: Do i need this MTA thing ? I now have exim4 running. I read that it's needed to deliver error messages, but not sure what kind of error messages. I want to remove as much services as possible. Can i remove it from my host os without facing later problems?

item.title: MTA on host os
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I personally never felt need for it. All depends on you. Also as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian.

Read full topic
